entities.name: sound
entities.description: The sound described as a long, wailing shriek that filled the room.

entities.name: riddikulus
entities.description: A spell shouted by Seamus and Dean to counteract the banshee's scream.

entities.name: banshee
entities.description: A supernatural creature that is described as making a rasping noise and turning into different forms.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: One of the students who shouts 'Riddikulus!' to counteract the banshee's scream.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A person who shouts that the banshee is confused and they are getting there.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: One of the students who hurries forward to help counteract the banshee's scream.

relationships.description: The sound causes the banshee to make a rasping noise and turn into different forms.
The spell 'Riddikulus' affects the banshee, causing it to become confused.
Seamus uses the spell 'Riddikulus' to counteract the banshee's scream.
Lupin describes the banshee as being confused.
Dean uses the spell 'Riddikulus' to counteract the banshee's scream.
